metadata.description: Specifies the name of the data collection rule to create.
Specifies the Azure resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to use to send data to.
Specifies the Azure resource ID of the Data Collection Endpoint to use.

columns.name: AADTenantId
columns.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID.

columns.name: AppDisplayName
columns.description: The application name displayed in the Azure Portal.

columns.name: AppId
columns.description: The application identifier in Azure Active Directory.

columns.name: AuthenticationContextClassReferences
columns.description: Contains a collection of values that represent the conditional access authentication contexts applied to the sign-in.

columns.name: AuthenticationDetails
columns.description: The result of the authentication attempt and additional details on the authentication method.

columns.name: AuthenticationProcessingDetails
columns.description: Additional authentication processing details, such as the agent name in case of PTA/PHS or Server/farm name in case of federated authentication.

columns.name: AuthenticationProtocol
columns.description: Lists the protocol type or grant type used in the authentication. Possible values are: none, oAuth2, ropc, wsFederation, saml20, deviceCode.

columns.name: AuthenticationRequirement
columns.description: This holds the highest level of authentication needed through all the sign-in steps for sign-in to succeed.

columns.name: AuthenticationRequirementPolicies
columns.description: Sources of authentication requirement, such as conditional access, per-user MFA, identity protection, and security defaults.

columns.name: AutonomousSystemNumber
columns.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the network used by the actor.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Category of the sign-in event.

columns.name: ClientAppUsed
columns.description: The legacy client used for sign-in activity. For example: Browser, Exchange ActiveSync, Modern clients, IMAP, MAPI, SMTP, or POP.

columns.name: ConditionalAccessPolicies
columns.description: A list of conditional access policies that are triggered by the corresponding sign-in activity.

columns.name: ConditionalAccessStatus
columns.description: The status of the conditional access policy triggered. Possible values: success, failure, or notApplied.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The identifier that's sent from the client when sign-in is initiated.

columns.name: CreatedDateTime
columns.description: The date and time the sign-in was initiated. Always in UTC time.

columns.name: CrossTenantAccessType
columns.description: Describes the type of cross-tenant access used by the actor to access the resource.

columns.name: DeviceDetail
columns.description: The device information from where the sign-in occurred.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: Duration of the sign-in process in milliseconds.

columns.name: HomeTenantId
columns.description: The tenant identifier of the user initiating the sign in.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The identifier representing the sign-in activity.

columns.name: Identity
columns.description: The display name of the actor identified in the sign-in.

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the client from where the sign-in occurred.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: Risk level associated with the sign-in.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The 2 letter country code from where the sign-in occurred.

columns.name: LocationDetails
columns.description: Provides detailed location information of the sign-in.

columns.name: MfaDetail
columns.description: This property is deprecated.

columns.name: NetworkLocationDetails
columns.description: The network location details including the type of network used.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The name of the operation performed during the sign-in.

columns.name: OperationVersion
columns.description: The version of the operation performed.

columns.name: OriginalRequestId
columns.description: The request identifier of the first request in the authentication sequence.

columns.name: ProcessingTimeInMilliseconds
columns.description: The processing time for the sign-in in milliseconds.

columns.name: Resource
columns.description: The resource the user signed in to.

columns.name: ResourceDisplayName
columns.description: The name of the resource that the user signed in to.

columns.name: ResourceGroup
columns.description: The resource group associated with the sign-in.

columns.name: ResourceId
columns.description: The identifier of the resource that the user signed in to.

columns.name: ResourceIdentity
columns.description: The identity of the resource that the user signed in to.

columns.name: ResourceServicePrincipalId
columns.description: The identifier of the service principal representing the target resource in the sign-in event.

columns.name: ResourceTenantId
columns.description: The tenant identifier of the resource referenced in the sign-in.

columns.name: ResultDescription
columns.description: Provides the error message or the reason for failure for the corresponding sign-in activity.

columns.name: ResultSignature
columns.description: The signature of the result.

columns.name: ResultType
columns.description: Provides the 5-6 digit error code generated during a sign-in event.

columns.name: RiskDetail
columns.description: The reason behind a specific state of a risky user, sign-in, or a risk event.

columns.name: RiskEventTypes
columns.description: This property is deprecated.

columns.name: RiskEventTypes_V2
columns.description: The list of risk event types associated with the sign-in.

columns.name: RiskLevelAggregated
columns.description: The aggregated risk level.

columns.name: RiskLevelDuringSignIn
columns.description: The risk level during sign-in.

columns.name: RiskState
columns.description: The risk state of a risky user, sign-in, or a risk event.

columns.name: SessionLifetimePolicies
columns.description: Any conditional access session management policies that were applied during the sign-in event.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The sign-in status, including error code and description.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The time the sign-in record was generated.

columns.name: TokenIssuerType
columns.description: The type of identity provider.

columns.name: UniqueTokenIdentifier
columns.description: A unique base64 encoded request identifier used to track tokens issued by Azure AD.

columns.name: UserAgent
columns.description: The user agent information related to sign-in.

columns.name: UserDisplayName
columns.description: The display name of the user.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The identifier of the user.

columns.name: UserPrincipalName
columns.description: The UPN of the user.

columns.name: UserType
columns.description: The type of the user.
